item.title: How to hedge if the resilient Nasdaq runs out of steam
item.description: Jeff Kilburg breaks down a risk reversal trade in the QQQs.

item.title: Why the 'hotter-than-expected' inflation reports this week weren't that hot
item.description: Wall Street would normally be panicking after the two inflation reports we had this week. Yet, the major market averages are standing tall.

item.title: Airbnb gets an upgrade from Baird after the property rental giant posts strong earnings
item.description: This travel stock could be due for sizable gains over the next several months despite its recent underperformance, according to Baird.

item.title: This dental aligner stock is poised to jump more than 20%, Wells Fargo says
item.description: An improving market backdrop could send shares of Align Technology higher, according to Wells Fargo.
